Articles.Content:
^ as soon as I saw what I had typed for the next word, I was seriously hoping someone used fudge ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

[you-tin-buh-dug-uh-duck] Exclamatory word, used when someone is angry at someone else for impersonating a duck.

Also, just say that out loud, its fun to say. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

ckdnrbnjcvj

[sik-din-erb-nij-kev-juh] Noun: The first exoplanet to be discovered by the Kerbler Space Telescope.

bfjerioe

[buff-jare-ee-oh] Noun, a turn of the century circus strong man. Known by his stage name "Buff Jerrio."

utmvbvbsufdj

[ut-mvb-vbs-ufdj] Noun. The action of trying to speak with your lips closed.

fjopkjfkls

Fop-Kif-Less

Noun: A person who doesn't breath from their mouth or nose, but through their eye sockets, ears, or other orafices. Commonly through the pores on the skin.

Hasgakal

[Has-gak-al] Noun, a type of carnivorous doglike creature that shares ancestry with Jackals.

uutgdfrere

[Atgdffffere] this is what's happens when you sneeze cough vomit choke and burp at the same time (ew)

troleab

[Trowlib] A type of fish which eats sand and crabs.

ghurrn

[guh-hurn] Noun, a type of vase.

ertmbhdefm

[erthum-bduhfum] Noun, formed by Jeb when mission control asked why is multimillion vessel flying towards to KSC at over 2000 km/h

bbnziuzde

[bbn-zi-uzde] noun, Drug used for treating Jeb' psychotic episodes

edit: Crap! i forgot the word!

htfykub

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-04T21:10:25Z" title="05/04/2015 09:10  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 4, 2015</time> by AletzN1**

[Hyit-fee-koobe] Sigma origins. Translates to "Rapid taking"

Rukkcokeutj

[ruck-eh-coke-oot-juh] Expression, used when out of Coca-Cola at a restaurant but you're too full to ask for more properly.

nbteembm

[nib-teem-bim] A teenager TV show that was cancelled after the first episode.

Every now and then we should have a vaguely pronounceable word, so...

Sokatoa

An onamonapia of the mathematical use of Sin, Cos, Tan, where the Sin/Cos = Tan or So/Ca = Toa, used to remember how to find the Tangent, Cosine, and Sine using the 2 variables besides the one you are trying to find

Ex. Socatoa. Sin/Cos = Tan

 Tancosin. Tan Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Cos = Sin

 Sintoacos. Sin/Tan = Cos

Thats the most fun I have had writing a post. For some reason...

akusgyrfuafgjlygly (ow my face)

[ack-oos-guy-er-foo-ah-fig-jill-ee-gill-ee]

 A scat phrase made popular in the Kerbal Jazz song, "*She's a Real Jilly Gilly.*"

uttvmjgtrswewew

> [ack-oos-guy-er-foo-ah-fig-jill-ee-gill-ee]
>  A scat phrase made popular in the Kerbal Jazz song, "*She's a Real Jilly Gilly.*"

> uttvmjgtrswewew

[ut-vim-jog-tor-so-*woo*-*woo*]

The first known mention of the "Hype Train" by a kerbal.

padfrmlokrt

(pad-from-low-kert)

a[REDACTED] from captain [REDACTED] [REDACTED]

if you know what I mean

jadohfbadbk

[Jjay-doe-eFf-buhd-uok] An river that held the world record for the shortest life span. Only 2.3 cycles.

Sumohuj

[soo-moh-hoo-jee] Noun, a Kerbal stomp-wrestler.

uitdsteqawh

(you-eet-dse-tek-o) a kerbal indian tribe that were the firt to greet the keropeans to kermerica.

ninaofdsboiqhf

[Neen-Ãƒâ€žoww-fid-sub-boe-eye-giff] Sigma origins. Translates to "Dad's panic gone"

Thuwedako

[thu-weh-DA-ko] 

n.

A very particular landmark, usually needing long observation to find.

rzeyth

[ar-zeth] Noun, a special type of green dragon with five eyes.

uitrtuibcv

[YOU-it-truh-TWO-ib-curve]

1) noun. A dance move where two people spin on their heels then one falls, knocking the other over.

2) verb. The act of carrying out said dance move.

> 
> No vowels detected. Unable to comply.

Ahem. Rhythms?
